entry.title: My Primary Principles on Software Development
entry.content:
Here are my two (or three) primary principles on software development:

  • Low coupling, High cohesion
  • Mind Cognitive Load

I found that most advices on programming can be explained by those principles.

entry.title: First blog post / changelog
entry.content:
The first post of this blog.

Blog changelog:
